Text:
Why all these files?
Must ba an ISO to burn.
How? Please answer.

You don't happen to have
Destroy All Humans Path Of The Furon
on Xbox 360 Pal?
How do I merge these files into an ISO?

Okay, figured out you need to extract the files using winzip but after that's all done and said I'm left with a generic image file with no extension.  I tried extracting it using Xbox Backup Creator but it didn't recognize the image.  I'd like to extract this game to my RGH, Any help would be greatly appreciated.

@fuci23 - Exactly the same problem. It's not like thenoobish to package stuff as badly as this... Several .000, .001 etc and a .dvd file which when extracted gives a generic disc image without a file extension which cannot be used in iso2god, isoextract or xbox backup creator. Even changing it to .ISO and/or burning with imgburn and the .dvd file doesn't work. Somebody please post how the fuck to sort this shit.
